beaversSystemInterface.VersionsMismatch: Your bsa-x module is outdated and no longer compatible
beaversSystemInterface.SystemNotFound: Could not find an implementation for that system. Maybe you missed to install the correct beavers system implementation module
beaversSystemInterface.MethodNotSupported: Your system does not yet support method:
beaversSystemInterface.SystemAdaptionNeeded: You can not execute this method without an active System Adaption Module.
beaversSystemInterface.SystemAdaptionNeededAdditional: You need to register your module on beavers system interface if you want access those methods without error
beaversSystemInterface.NoModulesRegistered: There is no module registered that requires beavers-system-interface.
beaversSystemInterface.NoImplementationRegistered: There is no system specific adaption module available, only some methods will work in this mode.

enableSelection.hint: beavers selection is a custom design for select boxes which can hold images. As it is not the native implementation it might break on some browser, if so you can disable it here
enableSelection.name: enable beavers selection

TokenMovement.desc: this module allows to control the movement of a token
